translations: 黄饼（核反应燃料重铀酸铵或重铀酸钠的俗称）

sentences.sentence: It has converted yellowcake into uranium hexafluoride gas.
sentences.translation: 他们已经能将黄饼转化为铀的六氟化物气体。

sentences.sentence: The international inspection team ensured that no yellowcake was missing.
sentences.translation: 国际监督小组保证，不会丢失任何镍矿石。

sentences.sentence: I was very curious about that, because I could not see why Iraq should at this stage, in 2002, want to import yellowcake.
sentences.translation: 我非常好奇为什么伊拉克在2002年还要进口“黄饼”。
